name: Classic Mayan Ruins Tour
description: Our most popular Chichen Itza tour, this classic tour  is the least expensive way to see the Mayan Ruins from Playa del Carmen. We'll travel in air-conditioned comfort from Playa del Carmen to Chichen Itza, stopping for a delicious buffet lunch. We'll also visit a cenote, where you can take photos or cool off with a swim.
